<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/users/{emailAddress}/passwordEncryptedPrivateKey"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a user's private key, using their email address as key. In the case of failure a rejected promise is returned to the caller.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"emailAddress","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"string"},"token":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}

>
